title: Personalized ophthalmology therapies market projected to grow to $5.46 B by 2029
summary: The personalized ophthalmology therapies market is expected to expand significantly from an estimated $2.82 billion in 2024 to about $3.23 billion in 2025, with a compound annual growth rate of roughly 14 percent through 2029, reaching approximately $5.46 billion, according to a new research report.
